name: Light Attack (RencurelI)
description:
The theme was "Panic". You must find the key to exit the old ruins. The torch is your safe haven. If it runs out, who knows what will try to catch you.

In that case you must light it back up. But you don't know how many match strokes it will take to light it up again ;)

(That was the original idea, unfortunately I did not have enough time to spare in order to finish integrating all the features)
